item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ggtree and your publication will be featured here. 2018 Phylogenetic approach to recover integration dates of latent HIV sequences within-host. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A, 2018. The role of adaptive strategies in plant naturalization. Ecology Letters, 2018. Microbial biogeography of 925 geothermal springs in New Zealand. Nature Communications, 2018, 9:2876. Defining endemic cholera at three levels of spatiotemporal resolution within Bangladesh.
